metadata.title: Elssanea Company – Website by Ebtkar Altqni
metadata.description: Elssanea Company specializes in manufacturing hangars, canopies, and prefabricated houses, with the ability to move factory equipment to the job site for easier on-site production and installation.

about.title: About Elssanea
about.description: Elssanea Company was established in 2019 and operates in the manufacturing of hangars, canopies, and prefabricated houses. The company uses specialized metalwork and forming capabilities for curved sheet metal and metal panels. One of our key advantages is the ability to transport factory equipment to the job site—inside or outside Al-Zawiya—making on-site work easier and faster.

values.title: On-site Production
values.description: We can relocate equipment to the project location for smooth field execution.

values.title: Manufacturing & Installation
values.description: End-to-end delivery: fabrication, supply, and installation based on project requirements.

values.title: Specialized Equipment
values.description: Metal forming and panel work (up to 5mm thickness as stated in the company materials).

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Integrated solutions for manufacturing and installing hangars, canopies, and prefabricated houses, including curved metal sheet work and metal panel fabrication based on your project needs.

timeline.title: Company Overview
timeline.description: Founded in 2019, Elssanea has grown to deliver both factory-grade fabrication and on-site execution through mobile equipment and experienced teams.

featuredProjects.title: Featured Work
featuredProjects.description: A selection of Elssanea projects in metal structures, hangars, and prefabricated units.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.description: Client testimonials can be added once available.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Send your request and we’ll get back with a detailed quotation.

projects.title: Our Work
projects.description: Browse examples of Elssanea’s manufacturing and on-site installation work.

services.title: Services
services.description: Manufacturing and installation services for metal structures and prefabricated solutions.

timeline.title: Company Overview
timeline.description: Elssanea Company was established in 2019 and provides manufacturing and installation with the added advantage of moving factory equipment to the job site inside or outside Al-Zawiya.
